thread.title: V3 Names Program Veteran Brian Janitschke Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: V3 Names Program Veteran Brian Janitschke Chief Operating Officer

organizations.name: business intelligence at western national insurance

text:
NEWTOWN, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- V3 Insurance Partners LLC, a leading specialty insurance program administrator, today announced that Brian Janitschke has been named Chief Operating Officer. The announcement was made by Susan Rivera, President and Chief Executive Officer.
“Thanks to his actuarial acumen and first-hand experience in the managing general agency (MGA) sector, Mr. Janitschke will make an outstanding addition to V3,” said Ms. Rivera. “He shares our vision of V3 as a sophisticated underwriting organization that is savvy, data-rich and capable of processing thousands of submissions in the SME business sector.”
Mr. Janitschke most recently held roles focused on predictive analytics as the Chief Actuary of Capital Insurance Group and the leader of Business Intelligence at Western National Insurance. However he is best known in the industry for his role as Senior Vice President of Program Products at QBE North America where he was also a member of the senior management team. By joining V3, he returns to the MGA space.
“V3 has already established itself as one of the industry’s most progressive program administrators,” said Mr. Janitschke. “I look forward to building on its commitment to underwriting, analytics and the latest in cost-efficient and customer-friendly technology.”
Mr. Janitschke began his insurance industry career as an assistant actuary at the St. Paul Companies. Subsequently, he served as senior partner at habitational specialist MGA Curry, MacWilliam, Janitschke before joining Collins as Vice President and Actuary. He then was asked to join Fireman’s Fund as Vice President of Professional Liability.
V3 was founded in 2009 with a mission to deliver truly progressive insurance program administration in specialty lines such as property, casualty, professional liability and workers’ compensation with coverage provided by nationally known, highly-rated insurance carriers. In addition to its reputation for advanced technology, the company is also known for its highly experienced insurance specialists.
Mr. Janitschke will be based at V3’s Newtown, PA, offices.
About V3 Insurance Partners LLC
V3 Insurance Partners LLC ( www.V3ins.com ) is a Newtown, Pa.‐based Specialty Program Administrator offering insurance programs targeted at middle market companies. Its three major practice groups are Internet Workers’ Compensation, Professional Lines and Property/Casualty, each managed by industry leaders chosen for their talent, expertise and integrity. V3’s focus is creating value for its carrier partners, producers and insured.
